Replace.Text: Great Works in Eleanorâ€™s cities each cause -3 Loyalty per turn in foreign cities within 9 tiles. A city that leaves another civilization due to a loss of Loyalty and is currently receiving the most Loyalty per turn from Eleanor's civilization skips the Free City step to join this civilization. Receive 50% more [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points.
